DOC.brief_summary: Background : Gravid diseases complication pregnancy . They include gestational diabetes preeclampsia . These cause problem fetus grows . Being pregnant twin make complication likely . Research suggest change fetal soft tissue may earliest sign growth problem . These tissue change lean mass , fat mass , organ size . 3D image might detect change earlier 2D image . This could help manage gravid disease . The NICHD Fetal Growth Studies - Singletons measure fetal growth four racial group , Caucasian , African American , Asian , Hispanic . Fetuses obese woman woman twin also measure . 2D 3D image take various stage pregnancy . Measurements take birth . Researchers want expand study measure organ volume body composition racial group twin . Objectives : To set standard body composition organ volume race . To understand relationship gravid disease change fetal body composition organ volume course pregnancy . To find whether different twin single pregnancy . Eligibility : Women participate NICHD Fetal Growth Studies - Singletons Twins . Design : The data come NICHD Fetal Growth Studies - Singletons Twins . Researchers review scan take previous study . DOC.detailed_description: The Division Intramural Population Health Research ( DIPHR ) conduct research study entitle : `` Fetal Body Composition Volumes Study '' catalog perform 2 Dimensional ( 2D ) 3 Dimensional ( 3D ) measurement obstetrical ultrasound image exist bank singleton twin gestation collect NICHD Fetal Growth Studies . The research study aim augment singleton Study organ volumes racial group understand relationship gravid diseases longitudinal change fetal body composition ( subcutaneous fat , lean mass ) organ measurement ( singleton ) course pregnancy , thereby , complement available data Cohort .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA eligible subject SINGLETON study : Singleton , viable pregnancy 8^+0 13^+6 week gestation Maternal age 18 40 year BMI 19.0 29.9 kg/m ( 2 ) low risk group ; BMI 30.0 45.0 kg/m ( 2 ) obese group Firm LMP LMPdate ultrasound date match within 5 day gestation estimate 8 week + 0 day 10 week + 6 day , 6 day 11 week + 0 day 12 week + 6 day , 7 day estimate 13 week + 0 day 13 week + 6 day No confirm suspect fetal congenital structural chromosomal anomaly Expect deliver one participate hospital No previous participation NICHD Fetal Growth Study EXCLUSION CRITERIA eligible subject SINGLETON study : The follow criterion apply nonobese woman : Smoked cigarette past six month Used illicit drug past year Having least 1 alcoholic drink per day Conception ovulation stimulation drug assist reproductive technology Chronic hypertension renal disease medical supervision Asthma require weekly medication Diabetes mellitus Thyroid disease medical supervision Autoimmune disorder ( rheumatoid arthritis , lupus , antiphospholipid antibody syndrome , scleroderma ) Hematologic disorder ( chronic anemia , sickle cell disease , thrombocytopenia , coagulation defect , thrombophilia ) Cancer HIV AIDS Epilepsy seizure medication occurrence within 2 year Psychiatric disorder ( bipolar disorder , depression , anxiety disorder currently require medication ) Current anorexia nervosa bulimia Previous severe preeclampsia , eclampsia , HELLP syndrome Previous gestational diabetes Previous stillbirth neonatal death Previous preterm birth ( < 34 week ) Previous low birthweight ( < 2,500g ) Previous macrosomia ( great equal 4,500 g ) The follow criterion apply obese woman : Chronic hypertension high blood pressure require two medication Diabetes pregnant Chronic renal disease medical supervision Autoimmune disease ( rheumatoid arthritis , lupus , antiphospholipid antibody syndrome , scleroderma ) Psychiatric disorder ( bipolar disorder , depression , anxiety disorder currently require medication ) Cancer ( currently receive treatment ) HIV AIDS INCLUSION CRITERIA TWIN study : Twin , viable pregnancy 8+0 13+6 week gestation ( large twin ) Maternal age 18 45 year Spontaneous pregnancy pregnancy ovulation induction vitro fertilization know date transfer Pregnancy egg donor embryo donor ( record anonymous know source ) LMPdate crownrump length measurement match within certain number day accord standard scheme ( large twin ) Expect deliver one participate hospital EXCLUSION CRITERIA TWIN study : Fetal reduction ( medically induce ) Congenital anomaly ( structural chromosomal ) Either twin increase nuchal translucency ( > 99th percentile crownrump length ; i.e . 3.5 mm ) Monochorionic twin Crownrump length discordance > 10 %
